attributes.action: create a St George's Day Bank Holiday on 23rd April, as every other country that makes up the UK celebrates their saints day this way
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: and to deprive the English of the right to celebrate their St George's Day. Surely the UK government being racist against the english, denying them the same rights that the irish, scottish and welsh already have.  We should be allowed to celebrate being english in its many and varied ways without being made to feel that doing so makes us somehow wrong or anti-others.  Because to not do so should surely make celebrating the other countries saints days racist against anyone not of that nationality.  And no a British day or a UK day is not the same thing.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
